channel.title: Asides on Deuts Log

item.title: Warranty Tracker
item.description:
Warranty Tracker

An open-source web application to manage product warranties, track expiration dates, and store related documents. - GitHub - sassanix/Warracker: An open-source web application to manage product warranties, track expiration dates, and store related documents.
Good if you’re in the business of tracking warranty expiration dates.
item.content:encoded:
Warranty Tracker

An open-source web application to manage product warranties, track expiration dates, and store related documents. - GitHub - sassanix/Warracker: An open-source web application to manage product warranties, track expiration dates, and store related documents.
Good if you’re in the business of tracking warranty expiration dates.

item.title: Bitwarden portal - backup solution
item.description:
Bitwarden portal - backup solution

Automate backup and restore between Bitwarden and/or Vaultwarden vault.
I want. Can I remove my reminders to backup my Bitwarden vault already after this? Hope so.
item.content:encoded:
Bitwarden portal - backup solution

Automate backup and restore between Bitwarden and/or Vaultwarden vault.
I want. Can I remove my reminders to backup my Bitwarden vault already after this? Hope so.

item.title: UCI Linkding Bookmarks
item.description:
UCI Linkding Bookmarks

A Docker container management script for running multiple instances of the linkding bookmark manager. Includes customizable title, logo and color theme.
I have always wondered how to customize Linkding logo and favicon. Now this is an option. The multi instance setup option is a plus!
item.content:encoded:
UCI Linkding Bookmarks

A Docker container management script for running multiple instances of the linkding bookmark manager. Includes customizable title, logo and color theme.
I have always wondered how to customize Linkding logo and favicon. Now this is an option. The multi instance setup option is a plus!

item.title: Resto POS
item.description:
Resto POS

RestoPOS is a cloud-based SaaS solution designed for restaurants, cafés, and food businesses to streamline billing, order management, inventory tracking, and more. Built with Laravel and Vue.js, it supports multi-tenancy, allowing multiple restaurants to operate independently on a single platform. - faizaldevs/RestoPOS
This should have been around when Chabee was here. It won’t boost our sales but at least we would have better insights into the operation.
item.content:encoded:
Resto POS

RestoPOS is a cloud-based SaaS solution designed for restaurants, cafés, and food businesses to streamline billing, order management, inventory tracking, and more. Built with Laravel and Vue.js, it supports multi-tenancy, allowing multiple restaurants to operate independently on a single platform. - faizaldevs/RestoPOS
This should have been around when Chabee was here. It won’t boost our sales but at least we would have better insights into the operation.

item.title: BookLore - eBook Manager
item.description:
BookLore - eBook Manager

BookLore is a web app for hosting and managing books on a home server. It allows users to view PDFs, eBooks, and track reading progress. With features like metadata management and reading stats, BookLore provides an easy way to organize and explore your personal library.
Another eBook management app, alternatives to Kavita and Calibre-Web.
item.content:encoded:
BookLore - eBook Manager

BookLore is a web app for hosting and managing books on a home server. It allows users to view PDFs, eBooks, and track reading progress. With features like metadata management and reading stats, BookLore provides an easy way to organize and explore your personal library.
Another eBook management app, alternatives to Kavita and Calibre-Web.

item.title: MkDocs Charts Plugin
item.description:
MkDocs Charts Plugin

Mkdocs plugin to include charts in your site.
Another one of those great MkDocs plugin we need to check out and install.
item.content:encoded:
